Title: Relates to providing information about extreme risk protection orders upon release or discharge of patients
Summary: Relates to including certain information about seeking extreme risk protection orders in written service plans for discharge and conditional release of patients to the community.
LawCode: Amd ยง29.15, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to including certain information about seeking extreme risk protection orders in written service plans for discharge and conditional release of patients to the community
